td.content: s:pt presents w/ c/o 2 days h/o moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain, moderate lower abdominal pain and moderate wheezing associated with food intake. pt is a 31 year old white male. denies any alcohol use he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 65 in, Weight 142 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Oxaliplatin - 85 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CT Abdomen.
